name: CAPD 2 PERITONEAL DIALYSIS SOLUTION
treatmentDescriptions: Magnesium Sulfate 50%w/v Inovamed  is indicated for:1.  the treatment of Magnesium deficiency in hypomagnesaemia. 2. the prevention and treatment of hypomagnesaemia in patients receiving total parenteral nutrition. 3. the control and prevention of seizures in severe pre-eclampsia.  4. the control and prevention of recurrent seizures in eclampsia
form: solution for injection / concentrate for solution for inj/inf

packaging.name: MAGNESIUM SULFATE 40MG/ML 1000ML HOSPIRAL USA SOLUTION FOR INJECTION

smartValidation.extractedFrom: MAGNESIUM SULFATE 40MG/ML 1000ML HOSPIRAL USA SOLUTION FOR INJECTION

aiResolution.reasoning: The option 1, CAPD 2 PERITONEAL DIALYSIS SOLUTION, has a similar formulation as an injection solution, and the strength of 1000.0ml is compatible with the medication MAGNESIUM SULFATE 50% W/V INOVAMED.
